allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct transaction ID calculation - client-side SHA-256

Cross-verified transaction ID calculation between Go and NodeJS Enterprise APIs:
- Transaction IDs ARE calculated client-side before API submission
- Pattern: SHA-256(blockchain + from + to + payload + nonce + timestamp)
- API echoes back the client-calculated ID in response
- Both implementations use identical calculation method

Updated research.md to reflect correct architecture decision based on 
source code analysis from both Enterprise API implementations.

Added reference documentation:
- docs/GO-CEP-APIS.xml (repomix from lessuselesss/Go-Enterprise-APIs)
- docs/NodeJS-CEP-APIS.xml (repomix from circular-protocol/NodeJS-Enterprise-APIs)
- specs/003-circular-mcp-server/ (Phase 0 complete, Phase 1 planning artifacts)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bring in Enterprise API clarifications from main branch to keep 
feature branch in sync with updated project documentation.

- Client-side transaction ID calculation clarification
